body.p:
Louisville Ky.
12- March/61
His Excellency,
B. Magoffin
Sir:
Mr. C. Sheehan of this city is a poor man and of good name.
As Bail for Andrew Sears appearance to answer an Indict. in the city Court. Mr Sheehan has been involved in a forfeited Recogn. I hope you will extend clemency to him &
